i1.name: Royal Privilege
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Qiyana's''' [[basic attack]]s and damaging [[ability|abilities]] deal {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|15 to 83}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 55% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}} to all enemies hit.
This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
''Royal Privilege's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reset on all targets upon gathering or changing an {{ai|Terrashape|Qiyana|Element}}.
i1.notes: * {{Pending for test}}: ''Royal Privelege's'' interaction with ''parrying'' effects ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|block}}, {{tip|blind}}).

w1.name: Terrashape
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} While holding an ''Element'', '''Qiyana''' gains {{sti|as|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}}, {{sti|range|25 '''bonus''' attack range}}, {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}} on her basic attacks and basic abilities, and [[Combat status|out-of-combat]] {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} while moving near the ''Element'' currently being held.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Qiyana''' {{tip|dashes}} towards the target location while gathering an ''Element'' of the nearest {{cci|Terrashape Brush.png}} {{sbc|{{as|Brush}}}}, {{cci|Terrashape River.png}} {{sbc|{{as|River}}}} or {{cci|Terrashape Rock.png}} {{sbc|{{as|Terrain}}}} she targeted and enchants her blade.
''A target Element is required to cast this ability''.
Once ''Terrashape'' has been learned, '''Qiyana''' is automatically given the {{cci|Terrashape Rock.png}} {{sbc|{{as|Terrain}}}} element upon [[Death|respawning]].
w1.notes:
* Terrain created by {{tip|champion|champions}} are not valid target terrain.
* The water puddles formed by the {{ui|Ocean Drake|Ocean Rift}} on {{tip|Summoner's Rift}} count as valid terrain for obtaining the {{cci|Terrashape River.png}} {{sbc|{{as|River}}}} element.
* The {{tip|brush|brushes}} grown by {{cai|Brushmaker|Ivern}} count for gathering the {{cci|Terrashape Brush.png}} {{sbc|{{as|Brush}}}} element.
* '''Qiyana''' can cast any of her abilities during the {{tip|dash}}.

effects.str:
• Bonus Attack Speed: %

  • Bonus Magic Damage: (+ 20% bonus AD) (+ 30% AP)

  • Bonus Movement Speed: %

e1.name: Audacity
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Qiyana''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} a fixed distance towards the target enemy, dealing {{as|physical damage}}.
'''Qiyana''' can cast any of her abilities during ''Audacity''. Casting {{ai|Edge of Ixtal|Qiyana}} during ''Audacity'' will autonomously aim at the dash target.
e1.notes:
* ''Audacity'' only damages targets if within 250 range at the end of the dash.
* {{ai|Terrashape|Qiyana}} will interrupt ''Audacity's'' dash.

r1.name: Supreme Display of Talent
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Qiyana''' sends a ''windblast'' in the target direction that {{tip|airborne|knocks back}} enemies. The ''windblast'' stops upon hitting {{as|terrain}}.

The ''windblast'' then creates an erupting shockwave across any {{sbc|{{as|River}}}} or {{sbc|{{as|Brush}}}} it passes through, as well as around the borders of {{as|terrain}} it reaches, dealing {{as|physical damage}}, with the percentage damage capped against {{tip|monster|monsters}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} enemies for {{passive progression/deprecated version|2|changedisplay=true|type=proximity|1|0.5|0|X}} seconds.
r1.notes:
* The windblast needs only to reach near terrain to trigger the terrain shockwave.
* Artificial terrain (e.g, {{cai|Crystallize|Anivia}}, {{cai|Weaver's Wall|Taliyah}}, {{cai|Pillar of Ice|Trundle}}) touching map terrain will be treated as a single piece of terrain, even when bridging two pieces of map terrain together; the shockwave will wrap around all connecting terrain. The shockwave's path is determined once it initially spreads; any expired terrain will be treated as if it were still there.
* ''Supreme Display of Talent'' will cast from wherever '''Qiyana''' is at the end of the cast time.
